intent_atoms.description: Expand metadata value decoding for additional data types surfaced by future fixtures so CLI exports stay aligned with MP4RA guidance.

Validation Rule #15 correlates stsc chunk runs, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and stco/co64 offsets to flag mismatches alongside the edit list duration diagnostics archived in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/122_C14c_Edit_List_Duration_Validation/.
